## Checklist
- [ ] Branch name follows the agreed convention (feature/fix/chore/docs)
- [ ] Code builds and runs locally (`npm run build` or equivalent)
- [ ] Lint/tests/type checks all pass (`npm run lint`, `npm run test`, etc.)
- [ ] Added/updated automated tests or storybook stories where it makes sense
- [ ] Sensitive data kept out of commits (no .env, tokens, or secrets)
- [ ] Documentation updated (README, ADR, or in-code comments) if behavior changed
- [ ] Reviewed by at least one teammate
- [ ] Linked to the corresponding issue or task tracker item
